summary.span: 表示图例项中的图例单元。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例用表示的图例项进行填充 。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 这些图例项由单独的图例单元组成，它们又由表示 。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 用于绘制图例单元背景的 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置图例中任何实体的背景色时，属性具有最高优先级。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格的内容超出了单元格的宽度，则可以将 属性设置为适应内容所需的单元格数。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 如果要向图例添加扩展页眉或标题，最常使用此属性。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 如果将此属性设置为大于1的值，则必须添加空图例单元，才能容纳扩展图例单元格的内容。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义图例单元的内容的图例单元类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示用于定义图例单元内容的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定每个图例单元格中将显示的内容的类型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 必须指定下列单元类型之一：One of the following cell types must be specified: - Text：使用属性指定一个字符串 ，该字符串将显示在图例单元中。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - SeriesSymbol：系列符号由 类中的属性定义 。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它将为图例单元显示。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 请记住，序列符号是一个可视指示器，即线条、矩形或标记。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator - a line, rectangle or marker. 如果 将设置为 ，则自定义项的所有标记特性都将应用于该单元格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 图像：使用属性定义图像 ，并将其显示在图例单元中。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 获取一个 对象，表示图例单元的字体。

span.span: A object that represents the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为“Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt”。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于设置图例单元的字体属性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果尝试 在运行时更改此对象的属性，则会发生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，必须创建一个新的 对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为 `ToolTip` 图例项和图例单元设置属性，则图例单元属性优先。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 此 属性允许您设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
